entry.et: Middle English, from Old English milde; akin to Greek malthakos soft, Latin mollis melt

def.dt: :gentle in nature or behavior has a mild disposition
:moderate in action or effect a mild sedative
:not sharp, spicy, or bitter mild cheese mild ale
:not being or involving what is extreme an analysis under mild conditions
:not severe :temperate a mild climate mild symptoms of disease
:a low-carbon structural steel that is easily worked
